result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Plea Hrg 4/18/17
Competency Hearing 7/28/16

(15CF256, 15CM483, 15TR5438 & 6278)Defendant Jared L Spencer in court, in custody with attorney Charles W Giesen.  Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Discussion held; Court reviews chgs and pens; No contest plea is entered in count 1 for 15CF256 w/o dangerous weapon enhancement & pleas no contest to 15TR6278; Court accepts pleas and finds defendant guilty and orders all remaining counts in 15CF256 & all counts in 15CM483 dismissed and read in and 15TR5438 is dismissed; parties request PSI; discussion held;  Sentencing hearing scheduled for July 21, 2017 at 10:00 am.

Attorney Steven John Luchsinger in court for Defendant Jared L Spencer. Prosecuting Atty Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for State of Wisconsin. Atty Luchsinger moves to be excused from plea hearing set for later today due to the plea agreement calls for this matter to be dismissed and def is represented by other counsel in the remaining matters; Discussion held; Court heard and Atty Luchsinger is excused from plea hearing/stc;

15CF256, 15CM483, 15TR5438, 15TR6278 Defendant Jared L Spencer in court, in custody with attorney Charles W Giesen and Attorney Steven Luschinger by telephone.  Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Giesen is requesting another status possible plea 30 days out.  Court so orders.  Status conference scheduled for April 18, 2017 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on April 18, 2017 at 10:30 am.
Status conference on February 24, 2017 at 11:30 am.
Status conference on February 16, 2017 at 11:30 am.
Order for Examination under 971.16 (Not Guilty by Reason of Mental Disease or Defect)
Order on Arraignment

15CF256, 15CM483 Defendant Jared L Spencer in court, in custody with attorney Charles W Giesen.  Gilbert Grant Thompson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Review of info is waived; not guilty plea and not guilty by mental disease or defect entered; 20 days mtns; stc set; bail con't.  The parties do not take a position on whom the court appoints as a doctor.  Court takes that under advisement for 10 days.  Atty Klomberg heard.  15CM483 is being called to track with this case.  Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for December 9, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Hearing on October 10, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Hearing on October 10, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

15CF256 & 15CM483 - Defendant Jared L Spencer in court, in custody in person with attorney Charles W Giesen by phone.  Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Giesen heard; only on CF case, does not represent in CM case. Exhibit List prepared. Dr. Lesley Chapin s/t. Doctor released from subpeona. Atty Giesen heard. DA Klomberg heard. Court heard and finds defendant has regained compentency, orders continue to receive medications as prescribed when in custody. Atty Giesen to draft order on medications. TSC set. records.descr: DE not competent to stand trial, case suspended

records.addlTxt: Telephone scheduling conference at 04-12-2016 08:15 am

Cases called 15CF256, 15CM483, 15TR5438, 15TR6278.  Defendant Jared L Spencer in court. Prosecuting Atty Kurt Frederich Klomberg appeared for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Charles W Giesen appeared by phone means for Defendant Jared L Spencer.  Atty. Giesen heard, his client is in concurrence.  Both parties waiving right to present evidence.  Court receives Dr. Schoeneker's report.  Atty. Klomberg is heard.  Court is heard - finds not competent at this time, but likely to become competent, commits defendant to custody of the department.  Court will schedule TSC.  Court will require periodic reports to Court.  Discussion regarding credit of pre-commitment incarceration 203 days, Court finds 203 days.  Telephone scheduling conference scheduled for April 12, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Hearing at 02-02-2016 03:30 pm
Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.

9:18 - Defendant Jared L Spencer in court, in custody.  James T. Sempf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has received copy of Criminal Complaint and advised of rights, charges and penalties. Court finds probable cause. RD & JT set. Court enters Not Guilty plea. Court sets $500 PA bond with conditions:   Defendant shall have his/her fingerprints and photographs taken at the Dodge County Sheriff's Department, Jail Division.  Return date scheduled for February 1, 2016 at 01:30 pm.  Status conference scheduled for February 26, 2016 at 09:00 am.
